name: Knell of the Depths
text: You invest a target with cursed elemental energy, causing nearby bodies of water to roil when the target draw nears and tendrils of water to drag it deeper under the waves. The target takes a –10 penalty on Swim checks and automatically sinks 15 feet per round when in any body of liquid. The creature does not sink if standing upon a solid surface capable of supporting its weight, even if it is submerged.
text_zh: 你令受术者被诅咒元素能量所复盖，当受术者靠近水时，附近的水体就会被扰动，并且水之卷须会将之拖向更深的海低。受术者在游泳检定上承受-10的罚值，并且在任何液体中自动下沉15尺/每轮。如果能站在一个可以支撑他体重的固态表面，则该生物不会下沉，就算他被淹没了。
